data.title: Extra: Reconcilliation
description: After the heist, Margot showed up at your door, now that she was broke. "I know you robbed me! I can't prove it but I know it!" she said
"Regardless, I had to declare bankruptcy and all my investors are after me now. You are the only one who can save me. So please let me stay with you for a while." she demanded.
Interested you told her that she could stay as long as she stayed quiet about the heist, let you fuck her freeuse whenever she wanted and serve as your concubine for a month.
Out of options she agreed and you made her your fuckpet. After her concubine punishment was over, you took her as your second wife and got rid of her debt.

You now have both her and your partners as bedwarmers every night. When you would wake up, Margot would give you a morning titjob as you made out with your partner. All three of you would then spend the day fucking your harem

data.title: Athelete
data.description: After the heist, you receive an email from two local atheletes. They are looking for sporting facilities in the region where they can train for the olympics. Being rich, you offer your mansion which is equiped with the latest equipment. You tell them that if they want to use your mansion's facilities they will have to pay for them in kind. Hearing this they take off their sports bras and start making out with you. After you fill them up with cum, you hire them as personal trainers and a recruited atheletes who are free to use the facilities on your mansion, in exchange for regular private "excercise" sessions with you. (Top row are college atheletes, Bottom row are MILF atheletes. You can mix and match but the text might not make sense)

data.title: Stepfamily
data.description: One day your stepmom and stepsis gives you a surprise visit. When they find out about your harem, they are at first repulsed. However, at night, your stepmother and stepsister come to your room and say they want to know how one can join the harem. You immediately start groping your stepmom and making out with your stepsister, explaining to the two of them that they just need to have sex with you to join. That night you took your sister's virginity and made her a woman, while your stepmom masterbated and made out with you. Consequently, they decided to stay with you and live a life of pleasure. (Top row is stepmom and Bottom row is stepsister. You can mix and match but the text might not make sense)

data.title: Failure
data.description: Your heist fails and your crew is arrested. Luckily, you were able to manipulate the law so that you could escape scot-free. Unfortunately, the Owner caught wind of your plans and sent out a hit crew after you. They captured you and took you to the owner for her to use you as fuckpet. She dominates you day and night, not letting you cum and spanking the shit out of you. Eventually, she gets bored with you and has you locked in a casino vault to starve to death.
